content.question: Which of the following best explains the error, if any, in the code segment?

choices.label: In line 1,  result  should be initialized to  true.
In line 2,  str1  and  str2  should be compared to  null  with the  equals  method.
In line 4,  str1  and  str2  should be compared to each other with the  equals  method.
The code segment contains no errors and works as intended.

content.answer: In line 4,  str1  and  str2  should be compared to each other with the  equals  method.

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
